name: Hero Image - Wedding vs Party
description: Testing which hero image drives more contact form submissions on homepage. Hypothesis: Party imagery may resonate better with younger demographics.

variants.name: Wedding Scene (Control)
variants.description: Traditional wedding DJ setup with elegant lighting and professional atmosphere

config.alt_text: Professional DJ setup at elegant wedding ceremony with romantic lighting

variants.name: Party Scene
variants.description: Energetic party atmosphere with dynamic lighting and dance floor energy

config.alt_text: Dynamic party DJ setup with exciting lighting effects and energetic crowd

metadata.hypothesis: Party imagery may attract younger demographics (25-35) and increase conversion rates by emphasizing the fun, energetic aspect of DJ services
metadata.success_criteria: 10% or greater improvement in conversion rate with 95% confidence
